name: Barbecue Turkey Meatballs
author: Voskos
summary: VOSKOS® Nonfat Honey Greek Yogurt adds a hint of sweet to these lean meatballs dressed up with marmalade barbecue sauce. For easy shaping, use a small scoop to form the meatballs, then bake them off in the oven. To party with ease, transfer meatballs and sauce to a slow cooker set on warm or low heat setting to serve. Serve with crunchy pretzel sticks as a fun substitute for wooden picks.
ingredients: 1 (5.3 ounce) container VOSKOS® Nonfat Honey Greek Yogurt
¼ cup orange marmalade or apricot preserves
directions: Combine egg, yogurt, bread crumbs, onion, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper in a large bowl
Place meatballs in a foil-lined 15x10x1-inch baking pan
Bake about 20 minutes or until meatballs are no longer pink
Add meatballs to warm Marmalade Barbecue Sauce (see below) in a large saucepan
Serve with pretzel sticks as picks
Marmalade Barbecue Sauce: Combine barbecue sauce and marmalade in a large saucepan; bring to boiling
